data.trans_hint: Anh ấy vứt các chai nước đi.
data.en_hint: He disposed of the water bottles.
data.content_game_1: He disposed of the water bottles.
data.answer_en_hint: He disposed of the water bottles.

data.trans_hint: Hai bên đồng ý tuân theo quyết định của quan tòa.
data.en_hint: The two parties agreed to abide by the judge's decision.
data.content_game_1: The two parties agreed to abide by the judge's decision.
data.answer_en_hint: The two parties agreed to abide by the judge's decision.

data.trans_hint: Sản xuất mới phải tuân theo các tiêu chuẩn mới nhất của thế giới.
data.en_hint: New manufacturing must adhere to world's newest standards.
data.content_game_1: New manufacturing must adhere to world's newest standards.
data.answer_en_hint: New manufacturing must adhere to world's newest standards.

data.trans: Tham gia vào, làm cho tham gia vào
data.trans_hint: Trước khi tham gia vào một công việc kinh doanh mới, quan trọng là phải nghiên cứu thật kĩ lưỡng.
data.en_hint: Before engaging in a new business, it is important to do thorough research.
data.content_game_1: Before engaging in a new business, it is important to do thorough research.
data.answer_en_hint: Before engaging in a new business, it is important to do thorough research.

data.trans_hint: Natsuko là một người cục cằn, điều này thường xuyên được ám chỉ trong các tác phẩm của Mishima.
data.en_hint: Natsuko was prone to violence, which are occasionally alluded to in Mishima's works.
data.content_game_1: Natsuko was prone to violence, which are occasionally alluded to in Mishima's works.
data.answer_en_hint: Natsuko was prone to violence, which are occasionally alluded to in Mishima's works.

data.trans: Đương đầu, đấu tranh, đối mặt (khó khăn, nghịch cảnh)
data.trans_hint: Vào năm 9 tuổi, anh ta đã phải đối mặt với sự ra đi của cả bố và mẹ.
data.en_hint: At the age of nine, he had to contend with the death of both parents.
data.content_game_1: At the age of nine, he had to contend with the death of both parents.
data.answer_en_hint: At the age of nine, he had to contend with the death of both parents.

data.trans_hint: Chúng ta có thể bỏ kiểu xưng hô nghiêm túc này đi, ông Smith ạ.
data.en_hint: We can dispense with any formalities, Mr. Smith.
data.content_game_1: We can dispense with any formalities, Mr. Smith.
data.answer_en_hint: We can dispense with any formalities, Mr. Smith.

data.trans: Lao vào, dấn mình vào, bắt tay vào
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy chuẩn bị bắt tay vào một cuộc thám hiểm lớn.
data.en_hint: She was about to embark on a major expedition.
data.content_game_1: She was about to embark on a major expedition.
data.answer_en_hint: She was about to embark on a major expedition.

data.trans_hint: Sam cam chịu sự thật rằng anh ta sẽ không bao giờ được thăng chức.
data.en_hint: Sam resigned himself to the fact that he would never be promoted.
data.content_game_1: Sam resigned himself to the fact that he would never be promoted.
data.answer_en_hint: Sam resigned himself to the fact that he would never be promoted.

data.trans: Đồng tình, tin tưởng vào cái gì
data.trans_hint: Các nhà chức trách không còn đồng tình với quan điểm rằng người tàn tật không nên được tuyển dụng.
data.en_hint: The authorities no longer subscribe to the view that disabled people should not be employed.
data.content_game_1: The authorities no longer subscribe to the view that disabled people should not be employed.
data.answer_en_hint: The authorities no longer subscribe to the view that disabled people should not be employed.

data.trans: Cam đoan, bảo đảm, xác minh, dẫn chứng, xác nhận
data.trans_hint: Các chuyên gia xác nhận tính xác thực của bức tranh.
data.en_hint: Experts vouch for the painting's authenticity.
data.content_game_1: Experts vouch for the painting's authenticity.
data.answer_en_hint: Experts vouch for the painting's authenticity.

data.trans: Dừng sử dụng dịch vụ gì (vì nó không còn cần thiết)
data.trans_hint: Bởi vì chúng tôi mất tất cả công việc của mình trong đợt dịch, chúng tôi đã phải dừng sử dụng những thiết bị đắt đỏ như tập gym hay xem HD TV.
data.en_hint: Since we both lost our jobs during the pandemic, we had to dispense with a lot of luxuries such as gym membership and HD TV.
data.content_game_1: Since we both lost our jobs during the pandemic, we had to dispense with a lot of luxuries such as gym membership and HD TV.
data.answer_en_hint: Since we both lost our jobs during the pandemic, we had to dispense with a lot of luxuries such as gym membership and HD TV.

data.trans_hint: Tôi sẽ chủ trì buổi họp hôm nay.
data.en_hint: I will preside over today's meeting.
data.content_game_1: I will preside over today's meeting.
data.answer_en_hint: I will preside over today's meeting.
